title: Best of The Program | Guests: John Ziegler & Salon Owner Lindsey Graham | 5/20/20
description:
Mediaite senior columnist John Ziegler breaks down why he believes “Ronan Farrow is a fraud.” Is the information in his book about Matt Lauer actually correct? Oregon salon owner Lindsey Graham is facing the full force of the state after she reopened early. There’s now a Ukrainian criminal investigation into Joe Biden, and an alleged leaked phone call may seal the deal. Head researcher Jason Buttrill joins with the latest.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
